title: Pixel 3xl drops car audio from previously connected devices list when I disconnect from the BT
content: After doing a factory reset to deal with a separate issue, my phone "forgets" my car Bluetooth once it disconnects from the car BT. I have to pair the phone anew every time I start the car. Other devices remain on the "previously connected devices" list while my car does not.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
